Summary: Watched object move for two hours in side to side and up and down manner
trends: There have been no other sightings in Milolii
This sighting has never been favorited.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsWe were having storms, power went out about 9PM, came back on around 4am. Got up to do rounds and saw what at first appeard to be a ship with a bright light out on the ocean to the west. Then figured it was just a bright star, so went back to bed. Then realized that it was an extreemely cloudy night, with no stars visable. If this was a star, it had to be beneath the clouds. Got back up to watch the object. Marked my position with a post and wathed the object go up and down about 15 degrees and side to side about 30 degrees. I am an ex-marine with the fighter wing, so I know aircraft and SAR planes. This was not a conventional aircraft. It was so captivating that I spent the rest of the night in the back yard watching this thing. Watched this thing until it got fairly light. It finally went into a dark thunder cloud due south. Called and talked with a couple of friends in the mainland to keep from freaking out while watching this thing. Trying to come to terms with this event. It is the first time I have ever seen anything like this.
